title: Just Before Black Friday, Amazon is Slashing Prices on The New MacBook Air With The XL 15-Inch Display
description: Amazon Slashes Prices on the Latest Apple Ultrabook.
author: Gizmodo Deals
excerpt: Amazon Slashes Prices on the Latest Apple Ultrabook.
text: Launched in March, the latest 256GB MacBook Air M3 15-inch is making waves this early Black Friday with a great deal on Amazon. Currently priced at $1,091 down from its original price of $1,299 for the 8GB RAM and 256GB storage version, you can secure a massive savings if you’re looking to upgrade your tech. For those who prefer a bit more storage, the 512GB version is also available at a similar discount. See at Amazon Equipped with Apple’s latest M3 chip, the MacBook Air is a lean yet powerful machine. It features an 8-core CPU and an optional 10-core GPU and provides lightning-fast performance for both work and play. Whether you’re editing videos, running complex software or simply browsing the web, the M3 chip ensures that everything runs smoothly. The lightweight design of the MacBook Air makes it incredibly portable: at under half an inch thick, it can easily slide into any bag and accompany you wherever you go. Powerhouse The model on sale at Amazon boasts a stunning 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display that supports up to 1 billion colors: this display not only enhances your viewing experience but is also perfect for creative professionals who rely on accurate colors for their work. Coupled with a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, 3 microphones and 6 speakers equipped with Spatial Audio, the MacBook Air delivers an immersive multimedia experience. With up to 18 hours of battery life, you can also work (or play) all day without needing to reach for a charger for your laptop. This feature is particularly beneficial for students and professionals who are often on the go and may not have access to power outlets throughout the day. The integration of Apple Intelligence adds another layer of convenience to your daily tasks: this personal intelligence system helps users write, organize, and manage tasks more efficiently while maintaining robust privacy protections. You can feel secure knowing that your data remains private and inaccessible to anyone else, including Apple itself. The MacBook Air M3 (you can see our review here) comes with two Thunderbolt ports, a headphone jack, Wi-Fi 6E support, Bluetooth 5.3, and a MagSafe charging port. This allows you to connect multiple devices seamlessly while enjoying faster data transfer speeds. You can also connect up to two external displays even with the laptop lid closed—perfect for multitasking or enhancing your workspace.giz With this great price reduction just ahead of Black Friday, the new MacBook Air M3 15-inch is an exceptional offer that shouldn’t be overlooked. Whether you’re a student, a professional or simply someone who enjoys high-quality technology, this laptop provides everything you need for efficiency and enjoyment in one sleek package.
